snippet: Egypt began evacuating hundreds of families from Rafah on Thursday after a senior official acknowledged that the military was eliminating the town to complete a security zone.
abstract: Egypt evacuates hundreds of families from town of Rafah near Gaza Strip as military begins erasing town to complete security zone along Palestinian territory; actions are response to repeated attacks by militants against Egyptian security forces.
lead_paragraph: Egypt began evacuating hundreds of families from Rafah on Thursday after a senior official acknowledged that the military was eliminating the town to complete a security zone.

headline.main: Egypt Moves to Eradicate Town Near Gaza Strip
headline.print_headline: Egypt Moves to Eradicate Town Near Gaza Strip
